div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 26px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-weight: bold;
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 2.当DOM树很高时，轻微的修改可能会导致整个页面变化

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 2.当修改时，模拟第二棵DOM树，通过DIFF算法对比两个模拟DOM树

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 减少修改，模拟DOM只模拟真实DOM少量字段，速度快

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 1.新旧两树的根类型不同，React会销毁旧树，创建新树，最后进行渲染

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 2.对于类型相同的React DOM 元素，React会对比两者的属性是否相同，只更新不同的属性

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 3.在子节点中插入节点，可以通过key属性处理

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 安装npm -> cnpm 切换镜像

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: npm i -S react react-dom // 浏览器

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: npm install creat-react-app -g // 服务器编译

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: React是js的封装库，类似JQ，html导入依赖即可在浏览器运行，慢

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: React全家桶，在服务器编译，快

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 1 通过 JS函数 创建（无状态组件）

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 2 通过 class 创建（有状态组件）// 状态有生命周期，可变化，继承于React.Component

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 1. 函数名/类名 => 组件名 => 首字大写

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 2. 返回值，根元素只有一个

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 2. 用于组件数据传输，常用于父子组件

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: PS: 不要在 render() 方法中调用 setState() 方法来修改state的值

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 不要在render方法中调用 setState() 方法，否则会递归渲染

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 运行与交互Update // 执行多次

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 通过 this.props 获取到上一次的值

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 可修改state，但不会触发render，已经在渲染之中了

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 返回布尔值，决定是否渲染

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 通过某个条件渲染组件，降低组件渲染频率，提升组件性能

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 参数：新的属性和状态对象

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 只读参数，将要渲染，不设置setState()，避免循环

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 参数：旧的属性和状态对象

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 1 通过React事件机制 onClick 绑定

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 2 JS原生方式绑定，通过ref获取元素

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 2 通过 箭头函数 绑定

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 类似表单控件，本身有熟悉接收用户输入，并触发事件

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 而React只能通过setState()，触发渲染事件

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: React组件设置函数，作为触发事件赋予表单控件

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 触发事件，可接收到用户输入，并设置setState()进行渲染

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 14px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 状态管理工具，用来管理应用中的数据

div.style: display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: pre; overflow-wrap: break-word; tab-size: 4; text-align: left; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);
div.p: 跨域获取数据的三种常用方式
